mapper.select: select b.mc as yljgmc,c.JZKSMC as sqks,a.ssczmc,to_char(sskssj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as rq,ssqzd,sshzd,ssysxm,mzysxm from TB_Operation_Detail a left join tb_volap_yljg b on a.yljgdm=b.id left join TB_YL_ZY_Medical_Record c on a.yljgdm=c.yljgdm and a.jzlsh=c.jzlsh where 1=1 and to_char(sskssj,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=to_char(sysdate-30,'yyyy-mm-dd')

select count(1) as rs,b.mc as yljgmc,a.yljgdm,a.ssjb,c.JZKSBM as sqksbm ,c.JZKSmc as sqks from TB_Operation_Detail a left join tb_volap_yljg b on a.yljgdm=b.id inner join TB_YL_ZY_Medical_Record c on a.yljgdm=c.yljgdm and a.jzlsh=c.jzlsh where 1=1 and to_char(sskssj,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=to_char(sysdate-30,'yyyy-mm-dd')
group by b.mc,a.yljgdm,a.ssjb,c.JZKSBM,c.JZKSmc
